Generation I.Red: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
Generation I.Yellow: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
Generation I.Stadium: If it encounters an enemy, it raises its head, intimidating the opponent with the frightening pattern on its body.

Generation II.Gold: Transfixing prey with the face-like pattern on its belly, it binds and poisons the frightened victim.
Generation II.Silver: With a very vengeful nature, it won't give up the chase, no matter how far, once it targets its prey.
Generation II.Crystal: To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie sounds by expelling air from its mouth.
Generation II.Stadium 2: Transfixing prey with the face-like pattern on its belly, it binds and poisons the frightened victim. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) With a very vengeful nature, it won't give up the chase, no matter how far, once it targets its prey. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: This Pok é mon is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once Arbok wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.
Generation III.Sapphire: This Pok é mon is terrifically strong in order to constrict things with its body. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once Arbok wraps its body around its foe, escaping its crunching embrace is impossible.
Generation III.Emerald: This Pok é mon has a terrifically strong constricting power. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once it wraps its body around its foe, escaping is impossible.
Generation III.FireRed: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

Generation II.Crystal: Routes 3 , 4 , 26 , 27 , 28 , 42 and Mt. Silver Morning Day
